rules.name: Hardcoded credentials in Property
rules.description: Properties containing passwords or credentials should not be hardcoded
rules.rationale: Credentials in MSI files can be extracted, posing security risks

rules.name: Insecure custom action execution
rules.description: Custom actions running with elevated privileges should be reviewed
rules.rationale: Deferred custom actions run as SYSTEM and can be security risks

rules.name: World-writable permissions
rules.description: PermissionEx granting write access to Everyone is dangerous
rules.rationale: Allowing all users write access can lead to privilege escalation

rules.name: Missing digital signature
rules.description: MSI package should be digitally signed
rules.rationale: Unsigned packages may trigger security warnings and are harder to trust

rules.name: Too many components in feature
rules.description: Feature has more than 1600 components
rules.rationale: Large features can slow down installation and UI responsiveness

rules.name: Uncompressed files
rules.description: Files not stored in cabinet may increase package size
rules.rationale: Cabinet compression reduces package size and download time

rules.name: Multiple files per component
rules.description: Component contains multiple files, consider splitting
rules.rationale: One file per component improves patching and repair efficiency

rules.name: Missing Component GUID
rules.description: Component must have a GUID for proper reference counting
rules.rationale: Components without GUIDs cannot be properly tracked or upgraded

rules.name: Permanent component without GUID
rules.description: Permanent components should have a GUID
rules.rationale: ICE92 validation will fail for permanent components without GUIDs

rules.name: Mixed per-user and per-machine data
rules.description: Component mixes per-user and per-machine resources
rules.rationale: ICE57 requires components to not mix installation contexts

rules.name: Duplicate file in multiple components
rules.description: Same file appears in multiple components
rules.rationale: Can cause ICE30 errors and unpredictable installation behavior

rules.name: User profile component without HKCU KeyPath
rules.description: Component in user profile should use HKCU registry as KeyPath
rules.rationale: ICE38 requires components in user profile to have HKCU KeyPath

rules.name: Font not in FontsFolder
rules.description: Font files should be installed to FontsFolder
rules.rationale: ICE07 validates that fonts are installed to the correct location

rules.name: Missing file version
rules.description: Non-font versioned file should have a language
rules.rationale: ICE60 requires versioned files to have language information

rules.name: Companion file as KeyPath
rules.description: Companion files should not be used as KeyPath
rules.rationale: ICE54 warns against using companion files as key paths

rules.name: Invalid directory structure
rules.description: Directory structure must have a single valid root
rules.rationale: ICE56 validates proper directory tree structure

rules.name: Directory in user profile without roaming cleanup
rules.description: New directories in user profile should be removed in roaming scenarios
rules.rationale: ICE64 ensures proper cleanup for roaming profiles

rules.name: Registry entries belong in other tables
rules.description: Some registry entries should use specialized tables instead
rules.rationale: ICE33 identifies registry entries that belong in Class, TypeLib, etc.

rules.name: Non-REG_SZ default value
rules.description: Default registry values should be REG_SZ type
rules.rationale: ICE49 validates registry default value types

rules.name: Invalid integer registry value format
rules.description: Integer registry values must be formatted correctly
rules.rationale: ICE70 verifies integer registry value specifications

rules.name: Feature name too long
rules.description: Feature name exceeds 38 characters
rules.rationale: ICE101 limits feature names to 38 characters

rules.name: Invalid FollowParent on parent feature
rules.description: Parent features should not have FollowParent attribute
rules.rationale: ICE14 validates feature parent relationships

rules.name: Component not mapped to feature
rules.description: All components must be assigned to a feature
rules.rationale: ICE21 ensures components are mapped to features

rules.name: Custom action name matches standard action
rules.description: Custom action should not use standard action names
rules.rationale: ICE93 warns about naming conflicts with standard actions

rules.name: Invalid custom action in AdvtExecuteSequence
rules.description: Only type 19, 35, 51 custom actions allowed in AdvtExecuteSequence
rules.rationale: ICE72 restricts custom action types in advertisement sequence

rules.name: In-script CA outside transaction
rules.description: In-script custom actions must be between InstallInitialize and InstallFinalize
rules.rationale: ICE77 validates custom action sequencing

rules.name: File-based CA before CostFinalize
rules.description: Custom actions using installed files must be after CostFinalize
rules.rationale: ICE75 ensures file availability before custom action execution

rules.name: RemoveExistingProducts sequencing
rules.description: RemoveExistingProducts should be properly sequenced for major upgrades
rules.rationale: ICE63 validates upgrade action sequencing

rules.name: Invalid Upgrade table entry
rules.description: Upgrade table has validation errors
rules.rationale: ICE61 validates the Upgrade table structure

rules.name: MSI elements in bundle
rules.description: MSI-only elements should not be used in bundles
rules.rationale: WiX v4 generates warnings for MSI elements misused in bundles

rules.name: ExePackage missing detection or uninstall
rules.description: ExePackage should have DetectCondition and UninstallArguments or be Permanent
rules.rationale: Ensures proper detection and clean uninstallation

rules.name: Consider using Protocol=burn for VC++ redist
rules.description: VC++ redistributables support burn protocol for better progress
rules.rationale: Using Protocol=burn enables better install progress tracking

rules.name: Non-advertised shortcut target mismatch
rules.description: Non-advertised shortcut target should be in same component
rules.rationale: ICE67 validates shortcut and target component relationships

rules.name: Unadvertised shortcut to GAC assembly
rules.description: Shortcuts to GAC assemblies should be advertised
rules.rationale: ICE94 warns about unadvertised shortcuts to GAC

rules.name: Shortcut directory as public property
rules.description: Shortcut directory should not be a public property
rules.rationale: ICE90 warns about shortcut directory resolution issues

rules.name: Missing Media entry for DiskId 1
rules.description: Media table must contain an entry with DiskId 1
rules.rationale: ICE71 requires at least one media entry with DiskId 1

rules.name: Too many media entries
rules.description: Media table should not have more than 80 rows
rules.rationale: ICE58 limits media entries for compatibility

rules.name: Product name too long
rules.description: ProductName should not exceed 63 characters
rules.rationale: ICE16 validates product name length

rules.name: Invalid Summary Information
rules.description: Summary Information stream has validation errors
rules.rationale: ICE39 validates package summary information

rules.name: 64-bit component mismatch
rules.description: Template and Page Count must correctly indicate 64-bit components
rules.rationale: ICE80 validates 64-bit package configuration
